messages.subject: UWWG - check out all the Speakers, Funshops, & Fun Events!
messages.msgSnippet: Just a quick note, to let everyone know about all the awesome Speakers, Funshops and Events planned so far for the......   2nd Annual Unschoolers Winter
messages.messageBody:
Just a quick note, to let everyone know about all the awesome Speakers, Funshops and Events planned so far for the......
 
2nd Annual Unschoolers Winter Waterpark Gathering
    Kalahari Indoor Waterpark Resort Resort - Sandusky Ohio
    February 2 - 6, 2009
    http://ugoevent.com/%c2%a0 (note - website recently updated and a new "make-over")
 


Over a Dozen Different Speakers & Discussion Leaders

Lots of Funshops for ALL ages

Awesome Events, including .....


Winter Carnival w/ lots of games, stage acts & even a Dunking Tank!

Talent Shows

Scavenger Hunt

Movie Nights

SSUDS Gatherings

Brand Ballroom Dance

and more.....

On-going Kid's  Craft and Playroom 

On-going Older Kids Lounge and Gaming Room

On-going Adult Lounge area

Thrilling Waterpark Rides and Coasters, Wavepools, hot-tubs and more... 

Super Discounted Room Rates ( Large Full Kitchen Suites Average only $21.50 / day - With Waterpark passes included!!!)

NO Conference or Registration fees ( participation to UWWG events included with your room rates!)
 
Check out the newly updated UWWG website for info on all the speakers, funshops and events:
http://ugoevent.com/%c2%a0
 
 
You truly won't want to miss this awesome gathering, with unschoolers from around the country!
 
Hope to see you in February!
 
~Carol Reinhard
UWWG Coordinator
 
Please pass this info along to help us spread the word!  Feel free to post this on all your local / and or national unschooling / life learning homeschool discussion boards. THANKS!

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
